revised_title: Absolute Measurements of Resistance Using Lorenz's Method
tldr: The authors describe a new method for measuring resistance using Lorenz's technique. They developed an instrument that eliminates the effect of Earth's magnetic field and can measure resistance accurately. The method involves using two discs, four magnetizing coils, and a Wheatstone bridge. The results show a satisfactory agreement with the International ohm standard, proving the effectiveness of the new method.
